content: Updates on projects forwarded by enthusiastsWebsite: https://modestcoin.xyz/Block Explorer: http://modestchain.xyz/Mining Pool: http://modestpool.xyz/Android Wallet: coming soon!Desktop Wallet: Available on GitHub.White Paper: https://[Suspicious link removed]/modestcoin-whitepaperGitHub: https://github.com/modestcoin/modestcoinReddit: https://reddit.com/r/modestcoin Username: your wallet addressPassword: anythingAlgorithm: scryptstratum+tcp://modestpool.xyz:3008stratum+tcp://modestpool.xyz:3032stratum+tcp://modestpool.xyz:3256https://github.com/tpruvot/cpuminer-multiMTC currency mixing cross-chain technology2.1 OverviewMTC currency mixing cross-chain technology combines the currency mixing technology of BTC, Ethereum and Litecoin to realize the mixed exchange of cryptocurrency on different blockchains. This technology enables anonymous swaps between different cryptocurrencies, enhancing the privacy of transactions.2.2 Technical principlesThe basic principle of MTC currency mixing cross-chain technology is to convert the cryptocurrencies of different blockchains into specific formats, then mix them together, and finally distribute them to different user accounts to realize the exchange of cryptocurrencies.Cryptocurrency format conversion: Convert cryptocurrencies from different blockchains such as BTC, Ethereum, and Litecoin into a unified format for hybrid exchange.Transaction Mixing: Combines converted cryptocurrencies into a mixing transaction that includes inputs and outputs from multiple users. This can increase transaction complexity and improve privacy.Distribute the mixed cryptocurrency: Distribute the mixed cryptocurrency to different user accounts to realize the exchange of cryptocurrency.2.3 Advantages and challengesAdvantage:Improve privacy: Through currency mixing technology, users’ transaction privacy and anonymity are enhanced.Cross-chain swap: enables the swap of cryptocurrencies on different blockchains, enhancing the liquidity and usability of cryptocurrencies.Improve security: Coin mixing technology can reduce the traceability of transactions and reduce user security risks.challenge:Technical complexity: Integrating currency mixing technology from different blockchains requires complex technology to handle multiple cryptocurrencies, which is challenging for developers.Security Risks: Due to the multiple cryptocurrencies and transactions involved, strict security measures are required to protect the safety of user assets.
